tags.name: ef-led-gauge
tags.description:
A component used to show data in a LED-like
horizontal bar visualization.

attributes.name: top-value
attributes.description:
Value of bar for top legend position
Value can be -100 to 100

attributes.name: bottom-value
attributes.description:
Value of bar for bottom legend position
Value can be -100 to 100

attributes.name: top-label
attributes.description: Label to be displayed in the top legend

attributes.name: bottom-label
attributes.description: Label to be displayed in the bottom legend

attributes.name: range-label
attributes.description:
Label to be displayed in the bottom legend
when a range is displayed
and no bottom text is already set.

attributes.name: neutral-color
attributes.description: Turn off background color and use grey

attributes.name: zero
attributes.description: Sets the zero scale position. [center, left, right]

properties.name: topValue
properties.description:
Value of bar for top legend position
Value can be -100 to 100

properties.name: bottomValue
properties.description:
Value of bar for bottom legend position
Value can be -100 to 100

properties.name: topLabel
properties.description: Label to be displayed in the top legend

properties.name: bottomLabel
properties.description: Label to be displayed in the bottom legend

properties.name: rangeLabel
properties.description:
Label to be displayed in the bottom legend
when a range is displayed
and no bottom text is already set.

properties.name: neutralColor
properties.description: Turn off background color and use grey

properties.name: zero
properties.description: Sets the zero scale position. [center, left, right]
